name: Within Our Ranks [Prototype]
description:
Hi!

This is the prototype of Within Our Ranks, which might or might not be finished when you are reading this. All in all, it's basically like Among Us but in 3D and with spatial voice chat. The Multiplayer also works fine, might have some bugs though...

It also has no sound, which I will add in the final version, srry!

 It's the prototype because it lacks a lot of features that the main version will have, such as different abilities for the killers and more tasks. The game also just looks a bit, bad...

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around

Hold Tab - Open Map

All other actions will have labels! :)
